name: Human Fall Flat VR
summary:
Rebuilt for VR 

Human Fall Flat VR features an intuitive 3rd-person view designed especially for VR headsets. Each controller you wield controls the respective arm of your Human avatar, adding an unprecedented level of physicality to the best-selling game. 

Enjoy classic Human Fall Flat levels 

The VR edition of Human Fall Flat includes all the levels from the game's original release, along with a wide selection of Extra Dreams created by some of the most talented community creators. From hazardous...
